channel.title: #GoCamp2017 on AFUO - СУОА

item.title: Ukraine is calling for international volunteers!
item.description: Do you have or would like to get volunteer experience? Ukraine is calling for you to participate in a new wave of English summer camps for children in 2017, including those affected by the armed conflict in Eastern Ukraine. We are looking for English-speaking volunteers who would come to Ukraine and interact with the children in English, get great time, new friends and unforgettable experience! As a volunteer you will get special training and opportunity to share experience in the following spheres: STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Art, Mathematics), Leadership and Career, Citizenship, Sports&Health!
